website_summaries.verdict: This bubbling air tub is the total package, combining modern features with a classic design
pros: It holds 70 gallons of water plus a  large grown man with ease
It will even hold two moderately sized people at the same time
It is very deep and large
cons: The plumbing fittings don’t seem to be standard sizes
They may have to be adjusted to prevent leaking, which will void the warranty

customer_reviews.title: A No Whrilpool Whirlpool tub
customer_reviews.text: We kept trying to get the jets to come on and they would not, at all. It is came with a broken remote control as well. It repeatedly tripped the circuit breaker in our new house. At this point it is just a big tub with silver holes in it.
customer_reviews.author: bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tub!!!
customer_reviews.text: So good!!! Best bang for the buck by far. Got it per recommendation from a family member. Comes with everything and then some. Spend most of the time just soaking, great hydro therapy. And fits two very comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: moverman

customer_reviews.title: Great tub
customer_reviews.text: This was a great find. I wanted a high end tub that had everything. This delivered and was less expensive than others I looked at. I use it all the time and my kids even more. Lying down is comfortable and I'm 6 ft tall. The Jets hit all the right spots. Great tub.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Installer commented that he liked how easy it was to install
customer_reviews.text: Ordered, arrived in timely manner, installed and working properly. Installer commented that he liked how easy it was to install. The blue tooth speakers work so nicely over the sounds of the whirlpool jets. Having had other whirlpool type tubs in the past, the speaker was a very nice feature. Wish the user guide included directions for the remote control. Lol- My kids wouldn’t have needed directions... Great Tub!
customer_reviews.author: Lorene

customer_reviews.title: Great tub! Beautiful AND functional!
customer_reviews.text: We lived this tub. I can't speak for the ease of installation since our contractor did it but I don't believe there were any difficulties. It's a beautiful yet functional and deep tub. Sadly we only got to enjoy it for a year before selling our home but we are actually going to buy it again to install in our new home!
customer_reviews.author: charlene

customer_reviews.title: Great tub.
customer_reviews.text: This tub has had the most comments of any item in my new house. Everyone loves it!! The LED lights are relaxing and the tub works perfectly. I wish it would fill faster and had Bluetooth and two speakers. Those are the only things I would change.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Powell

customer_reviews.title: Great tub with all the bells and whistles
customer_reviews.text: We love this tub! It is so deep and has all the bells & whistles! The jets are a nice bonus. A little difficult to install, which is my only complaint. I still give it 5 stars. Great tub for the money.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shores

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect and exactly what I was looking for in my new place. It does have all the bells and whistles and is enjoyable. I would but again
customer_reviews.author: Kellee Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great Product has it all plus super price
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase we have made for our new master bath. Terrific features super comfort and I am 6ft tall. Also vendor is excellent as far communicating
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Tub
customer_reviews.text: The product keeps dirty water in the lines, it is unusable as a whirlpool. The lights stopped working first, after using it 5 times, then the stench of the water from the lines became unbearable. Last straw was horrible UTI infection I received after sitting in the water. Now it won't come on at all to test the lines again. Terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: linda porter

customer_reviews.title: This Ariel whirlpool bath tug is a great product. It is deep and large
customer_reviews.text: This Ariel whirlpool bath tug is a great product. It is deep and large, and has all the bells and whistles anyone could want--great looks, radio, lights, powerful jets, and a self-cleaning system to ensure the tub and pipes stay clean and sanitary! I'd buy it again. Oh, and when comparing features and price this couldn't be beat. Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tub
customer_reviews.text: Tub looks good and was delivered without incident. Had a problem with the installation and it took me a week to reach someone. They were able to help me and now everything works. I would give it 5 stars if the installation manual was better written.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loves the style....we've yet to use it! Saves cost of faucet which is very expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy any other tub!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it. Perfect size, literally takes 5 minutes to clean. The bluetooth feature and on deck faucets are phenomenal. Great price too. I looked at some that were 5k and they were not as nice.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Deep soaking tub. The jets are amazing. I highly recommend this tub. I'm happy with my purchase. I only wish the station could be saved.
customer_reviews.author: highbeams

customer_reviews.title: Jet tub
customer_reviews.text: Love this tub we use it every night , colors , comfort power and looks are amazing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tub!
customer_reviews.text: I use this tub everyday and love it! The lights are fun, bluetooth and speakers are handy, and jets are great.
customer_reviews.author: MDP

customer_reviews.title: Good features
customer_reviews.text: The control is very easy to use. I also like the all the features especially the very powerful jets.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole_Fong

customer_reviews.title: We are still waiting for this tub to be installed ...
customer_reviews.text: We are still waiting for this tub to be installed, but the plumber and bathroom contractor were both very impressed when they removed it from the box.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie L. Quinlan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tub has everything you could ask for in a tub of this price.
customer_reviews.author: James N.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tub
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best purchase I've made on Amazon; this tub is everything!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Q

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tub!
customer_reviews.text: The tub arrived on 9/26/16 without any damage. I love the tub, can't wait to have it installed. My first review was only two stars because I hadn't received the tub yet. Now that the tub is here, I can give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: LYNDA WAGNER

customer_reviews.title: tub arrived and we finally got it installed the plumbers ...
customer_reviews.text: tub arrived and we finally got it installed the plumbers said the fittings felt loose. We are waiting for provisional power to see if the fitting hold. our plumber states if he has to make them tighter it will void warranty. I will update after we get water turned on.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Webb

customer_reviews.title: Simple and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tub sight unseen because it was the only free standing whirlpool tub that didn't look like something out of "Star Trek". I'm very happy with it. The only criticism I have is that it takes a while to fill. Part of the problem was using "sink hose" i.e. half inch braided stainless steel reinforced tubing for the hot/cold hookups. I used stainless steel corrigated flex pipe which improved the flow, but it still takes a while to fill. It is a big tub though. Two adults of average size could fit inside. The jets are powerful enough and their location makes sense. Not only does it look cool, it works.
customer_reviews.author: DuoArtDude

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tub - Terrible Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: The tub is fine - The controls are so poorly designed, I can't adjust the water temperature without a struggle. I attempted to rectify the problem with Ariel however they have the absolute worst customer support you can ever possibly imagine. They don't care what happens to you after you buy the product. I would avoid any Ariel product at all cost. If you don't believe me, call their support line prior to purchasing a product from them. You'll see how pathetic it is.
customer_reviews.author: James Lerose

customer_reviews.title: The jets don’t turn on.
customer_reviews.text: I loved it at first. Remote never did work. Had it installed before Christmas. Used it maybe 3 times. The screen won’t turn on and I have no way to turn on the jets. I changed the batteries in the remote but didn’t help.
customer_reviews.author: Carol mcrae

product_meta.title: ARIEL Platinum AM128JDCLZ Whirlpool Bathtub
product_meta.description: Imagine the sensation of dipping your entire body into this functional and elegant whirlpool bathtub from Ariel platinum. This model includes L.E.D. Chroma therapy lighting, FM radio and a touch sensitive LCD control panel for the latest in bathing technology. The 14 whirlpool jets deliver a deep massage to the pressure points of the body as you renew your body and mind during a soak.
feature_bullets: ✅ ACRYLIC REINFORCED FIBERGLASS: Thoughtfully designed Whirlpool Bathtub by ARIEL Platinum is constructed from premium acrylic which makes this unit exceptionally durable and resistant against heat and other structural damages such as cracking, chipping or fading. Moreover, with fiberglass reinforcement, this tub will continue to provide you an energizing bath experience for a longer period of time. Overall dimensions are 71" X 37.4" X 27.5" inches

✅ DYNAMIC DESIGN: The oval shape, ergonomic design of the ARIEL AM128JDCLZ cradles the bather in a comfortable position and supports your body as you stretch for ultimate repose for a deep and relaxing soak. Combining the best of form and function, the model features an advanced Bath Waste and Overflow drainage that will prevent the water from pouring onto the floor. The purposefully built heavy-duty and durable pre-installed drain fixtures smoothly drain the water away without clogging issues

✅ DESIGNATED HYDRO MASSAGE: Unlike traditional bathtubs, this model comes with an advanced Hydro-massage system designated to target your pressure points for a relaxing experience. The system features 14 multi-directional Whirlpool acupressure water jets and 6 water-flow settings for customizable water action of your liking. An elegantly designed waterfall faucet fills the tub with 3.7 gallons of water per minute. A powerful 1.5 HP motor provides ample power to operate the unit effectively

✅ SMART FEATURES: This bathroom tub features a built-in LED chromotherapy lighting to immerse your bathing environment in stunning hues of red, blue, green and other colors to enhance your bathing experience. Onboard FM radio, touch screen keypad, and Bluetooth technology so that you can enjoy your favorite tracks while getting refreshed

✅ 100% CUSTOMER SATISFACTION: We stand behind all of our high-quality products and offer a 2 Years limited manufacturer’s warranty with 30 days’ hassle-free return policy. Free curbside delivery is also available by appointment. The USA based personalized customer support

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars37 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
